text: avar unkalai'talak' colli vittal, unkalai vitac ciranta - muslimkalana, muhminana, (iraivanukku) valipattu natappavarkalana, tavpa ceypavarkalana, vanankupavarkalana, nonpu norpavarkalana - kannimai kalintavar, innum kannip pentir - ittakaiyavarai avarutaiya iraivan avarukku (unkalukkup) pakaramaka, manaiviyaray kotukkap potumanavan
